question: 電飾
sourceMnemonic: The <ja>電</ja> is what powers electric things. Many times, these electric things light up (especially back in the day, when electricity did this a lot more than other things). So, you have "lighting." Then, you have <kanji>decorate</kanji>. So, if you decorate with lighting, you have <vocabulary>decorative lighting</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
